metadata.description: High-quality SME AI adoption case studies with measurable ROI data from academic, consulting, industry, and vendor sources
metadata.data_quality_criteria: Only includes cases with at least 3 numerical metrics and verifiable sources

cases.ai_tools: AI Predictive Maintenance for Bottling Lines

key_findings: Average ROI for SMEs implementing AI is 495% across documented cases
Productivity gains average 56% for SMEs with AI implementations
Customer service automation shows highest immediate ROI (300-700%)
Manufacturing predictive maintenance delivers 15-50% downtime reduction
Retail AI personalization increases revenue by 12-30% on average
Content creation AI doubles output while reducing time by 80%
Contract review AI saves 70-85% of time for legal services
91% of SMEs using AI report revenue increases
Early GenAI adopters report $3.70 return per dollar invested
data_collection_methodology: Systematic web search across academic databases, consulting firm reports, industry publications, vendor case studies, and government reports from February 16, 2026. Only cases with at least 3 quantified metrics and verifiable sources were included.
